You can use this on a PC however you will need the hacked WoW.exe for build 13623 which is readily available.  You will also need the divxbundle.dll and whatever else the actual game client uses.  You can likely find this on any patch site.

Also I have renamed the Data folder and locale folders due to my custom language switcher.  You can only have one LANG folder present at any time else it messes up the binary and it defaults to whatever it finds first, which is pretty weird, it basically ignores your locale cVar if it finds a matching folder, odd.

Anyhow, i'm sure you inspiring hackers will figure it out.

Portuguese Brazil (ptBR) & Portuguese Portugal (ptPT) is in the EU manifest however it requires game client 4.3.0.  You get some sort of key error trying to use one of them and the other is ignored using the 4.0.6a client.

SET streamStatusMessage "0"

I discovered there is a Bug in this torrent.  I didn't test the behavior of the ZIP file in relationship to how Apple handles ZIP files that do not create a folder.

When you double click on the ZIP file it will create a new World.of.Warcraft.Cataclysm.v4.0.6a.Multi.10.Language.MacOS-HR folder.  It wasn't supposed to do that.

open this new folder up.  Delete Data-EU.  Move Data-EU that you downloaded to this new folder.

Run a Make Language command.

I apologize for not testing how this was working.  I assumed Apple would unpack the ZIP file correctly.  Now I am wondering how many people realized that and are playing the game while ignoring all 25 GB of the data they fetched.

Once I saw World of Warcraft uploads I knew the movie uploads would cease. WoW is extremely addicting. No way he would allow his computer to convert large files while putting his gaming fps at risk. WoW has destroyed kids in college forcing them to drop out. It has sent kids to therapy because their parents play all day and ignore them. He's done. You install WoW, you delete your life. /say bye bye HolyRoses. it was a nice ride. See you when you /gquit.

Oh, just so everyone knows, you can download any high res movie file, drop it in a program called handbrake, select the AppleTV preset, let it go, done. Drop into itunes and it's perfect. If you like the cover art and tags, use a meta program like MetaX and get all the info from IMDB and copy paste. It's easy peezy lemon squeezy

Not really commenting on the torrent, but just wanted to write in a response to Lemoncade.

What you have said is complete and utter bullshit, and I think everyone is stupider after having read it. I manage to cap valor every week on 3 85's while still maintaining a healthy social life with my family and friends. Hell, I'm hungover right now from a kegger that I went to last night. 

Honestly, I really don't know anyone that has let their life go to shit over World of Warcraft. It's all about managing your time and not spending countless hours a day on the game doing things that really don't matter in the long run for your toons.. ie. Sitting in trade chat or doing transmog runs.

It's people like you that give WoW a bad name by talking shit about it every time it comes up in conversation. It'd be nice if you didn't generalize because the way you describe the game is NOT how it really is anymore.
